alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hansford and northeastern Sherman Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Texhoma, or 19 miles east of Stratford, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gruver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
